channel.title: Greatly Appreciated! Read!
channel.description:
Hey guys im having alot of troubles atm the moment making my server have you seen how much i have posted lately on the server help section ye i have this mate micheal he helps me but he is never on msn i need a pro coder that can help me solve my problems i am a alright coder i am a starter i am not one of those kinds that make s a topic and wait i dont really wanna wait maybe if some one that is pro at coding can add me on msn my msn is freeky_enemy@live.co.uk and help me with my server on teamviewer they aslo have to be active this was i can learn quicker and understand asswell as getting my server up.
edit:would be great if there good at clients asswell hope im not asking for 2 much lol....

item.title: Greatly Appreciated! Read!
item.dc:creator: @freeky freeky
item.description:
@freeky wrote:

[quote=“The cook from runescape, post:5, topic:280823”]You learn better the hard way.

Your friend has most likely blocked you if he’s anything like me.[/quote]

my friend aint blocked me hes got school -.- and ok i will post my troubles here.

Read full topic

item.title: Greatly Appreciated! Read!

Then post your compiler troubles and let us help you that way! Then we both learn something!

item.title: Greatly Appreciated! Read!
item.dc:creator: @freeky freeky
item.description:
@freeky wrote:

dude i got the basic stuff i know naerly all the codes but i get problems when i compile so i need someone to help me fix them i sometimes can fix them but not all the time this is just an e.g ok look

i added some npc to autospawn yea and when i tryed to compile it i got a error i did nothing wrong and i still got the error and i dont know how to fix it.

EDIT:btw it didn’t even take me 1 week to get to the stage i am -.-

Read full topic

item.title: Greatly Appreciated! Read!
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

to be honest, everyone starts out like you, when i first started it took me 5 mins to find client.java, now look at me, im quite good, not as good as other people, but im getting there! Trust me, you feel SO much better if you make it your self, just look for simple tuts like changing starting location etc… Then when you get the basics, move on to the more complicated stuff. Trust me, it’s not going to come over night, ive been doing for for about a year, and i think, ive come on a hell of a lot!!

Read full topic
